address: Văn Hương, Đống Đa, Hà Nội

experience.company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN CÔNG NGHỆ VÀ TRUYỀN THÔNG BAMISU
experience.description: Led backend development for mobile online games (Match 3 RPG, Poker). Responsibilities included technical leadership, team management (estimation, task allocation, solutioning - Agile/Scrum), project structure initiation, training team members, extensive system and database design (Logic, Proxy, DB, Cache servers, SQL, NoSQL, Caching), core API development using Java (RESTful, Websocket) with Smartfox 2x, Apache Thrift, RabbitMQ, Hazelcast. Also involved in hands-on coding, unit testing, code review, deployment, server setup & management (Java, Firewall, Proxy, Nginx, MySQL, MongoDB), creating support tools for other teams, and performance monitoring/optimization. Possessed over 5 years of Java Backend experience.

experience.company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN CÔNG NGHỆ VÀ TRUYỀN THÔNG LIZARDTEK
experience.description: Developed backend systems for games, including Slot Machine and Card Game Online. Responsibilities included system analysis & design, module development, code optimization, unit testing, and bug fixing. Utilized Java, Smartfox 2x, Apache Thrift, Git, Couchbase, MySQL. Collaborated with various teams, optimized server/database issues, and was involved in research and application of new technologies.

experience.company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN CÔNG NGHỆ VÀ TRUYỀN THÔNG LIZARDTEK
experience.description: Developed HTML5 games (e.g., Mini Game Pack For Mobile) using Javascript and Cocos 2D JS Framework.
